ItemType.name: Napa S1 deflector
ItemType.description: The Napa series of deflectors are optimized for fast regeneration and short recovery times. They can be adjusted using the included Cabbage Corp Toolset to increase its strength by up to 200%.

ItemType.name: External-Napa S1 deflector
ItemType.description: The Napa series of deflectors are optimized for fast regeneration and short recovery times. This model has been modified for installation to the exterior of a ship. Can be adjusted using the included Cabbage Corp Toolset to increase its strength by up to 200%.

ItemType.name: dual Napa S1 deflector
ItemType.description: The Napa series of deflectors are optimized for fast regeneration and short recovery times. This model consists of two deflectors synchronized to boost regeneration. Can be adjusted using the included Cabbage Corp Toolset to increase its strength by up to 200%.

ItemType.name: Jadeite S1 deflector
ItemType.description: The Jadeite series of deflectors are optimized for fast regeneration though they disable all other ship systems when they collapse. They can be adjusted using the included Cabbage Corp Toolset to increase its strength by up to 200%.

Events.OnShieldDown: (block Nil (objMakeParalyzed gSource (random 40 200)) (objSendMessage gSource Nil "Shield power surge!") )
